text:
Vanzone con San Carlo is a "comune" (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region Piedmont.
Vanzone con San Carlo is about northeast of Turin and about west of Verbania. As of 2004, 482 people lived there. It has an area of.
Vanzone con San Carlo is next to these municipalities: Antrona Schieranco, Bannio Anzino, Calasca-Castiglione, Ceppo Morelli.
